channel.title: wasm on Benjamin Neil
channel.description: Recent content in wasm on Benjamin Neil

item.title: WASM and Webmentions
item.description: Webmentions So as I journey through the fun webmentions, it looks like since im just using github pages, I would migrate over to using cloudflare so I could play more with webworkers. My last attempt was that Danny Devito Quote generator that I believe was working fairly well. Although, having said that it really isnt at the point id like it to be. I originally wanted an “always sunny in philadelphia” to regale my coworkers with.
